CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'Diabetes Medications'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.Diabetes_medications.Initial_Message_Content__c , IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'Diabetes Meds - Adherence talk to a coach'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.Diabetes_Meds_Adherence_talk_to_a_coach.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'Diabetes care - Kidney disease monitoring'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.Diabetes_care_Kidney_disease_monitorin.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'Managing blood pressure'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.Managing_blood_pressure.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'BG-A1c Reminder'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.BG_A1c_Reminder.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'BG-Smoking Cessation'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.BG_Smoking_Cessation.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'BG-Exercise'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.BG_Exercise.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'BG-Eye Exam'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.BG_Eye_Exam.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'BG-Mail Order Meds'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.BG_Mail_Order_Meds.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'BG-Preventative Visit'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.BG_Preventative_Visit.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'BG-Flu Shot'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.BG_Flu_Shot.Initial_Message_Content__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Initial_Message__c,'BG-Telehealth'), $CustomMetadata.Campaign_Automation__mdt.BG_Telehealth.Initial_Message_Content__c, ''))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Initial Message Content
